value.name: Police Still Want to Know How 13-Year-Old Got Handgun, And Say New Law Hampering Efforts
value.description: Police still don’t know how a 13-year old boy they arrested on Saturday got a handgun. Police arrested the boy who they say was armed with a handgun and already being sought on a warrant after he ran from officers on Friday night,
